TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed MatchEvaluator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function MatchEvaluator(match As Match) As String

param.name: match
param.span: 物件，表示 方法作業期間的單一規則運算式相符項目。

span.span: The object that represents a single regular expression match during a method operation.

summary.span: 表示每次在 方法作業期間找到規則運算式 (Regular Expression) 相符項目時都會呼叫的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that is called each time a regular expression match is found during a method operation.

returns.span: 字串，由 委派 (Delegate) 所表示的方法傳回。

span.span: A string returned by the method that is represented by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用委派方法，以執行每個相符項目，例如取代方法所找到的自訂驗證或操作作業。You can use a delegate method to perform a custom verification or manipulation operation for each match found by a replacement method such as . 每個相符的字串，方法呼叫委派方法與物件，表示比對。For each matched string, the method calls the delegate method with a object that represents the match. 委派方法會執行任何您偏好，並傳回字串的處理方法取代為相符的字串。The delegate method performs whatever processing you prefer and returns a string that the method substitutes for the matched string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用委派給每個字元相符的群組取代相符項目數目。The following code example uses the delegate to replace every matched group of characters with the number of the match occurrence. [!code-cpp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.MatchEvaluator/CPP/regexreplace.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.MatchEvaluator/CS/regexreplace.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchEvaluator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.MatchEvaluator/VB/regexreplace.vb#1)]
